V-Dem [Country–Year/Country–Date] Dataset v10. Varieties of Democracy (V-Dem) Project. https://doi.org/10.23696/vdemds20.', 'link': 'https://www.v-dem.net/en/data/data-version-10/', 'retrievedDate': '2020-10-17', 'additionalInfo': 'Varieties of Democracy (V-Dem) is a new approach to conceptualizing and measuring democracy. The V-Dem institutes provide a multidimensional and disaggregated dataset that reflects the complexity of the concept of democracy as a system of rule that goes beyond the simple presence of elections. The V-Dem project distinguishes between five high-level principles of democracy: electoral, liberal, participatory, deliberative, and egalitarian, and collects data to measure these principles.'}
